actr.model
Class Instantiation

java.lang.Object
  actr.model.Instantiation

public class Instantiation
extends java.lang.Object

An instantiation of a production rule specified as a mapping from variables to values.

Author:
Dario Salvucci

Method Summary

          Gets the value of the given variable.

          Gets the production associated with this instantiation.

 int size()
          Gets the size of the instantiation (as the number of variables).
